verbose_text: Meanwhile, in CIR injured cardiomyocytes, increased generation of free radicals compromises the selective permeability of the inner mitochondrial membrane, leading to a drastic Ca 2 influx mediated mainly by mitochondrial Ca 2 uniporter (MCU) that collapses the mitochondrial function, severely reducing ATP production 4.
evidence: mediated mainly by mitochondrial Ca 2  uniporter (MCU
